name: The Dogginator
description:
100 push-ups a day. 10 days straight. If you make it, you'll become the Dogginator. Embrace the challenge. Show me what you got.

- Increase your daily streak, the doggie will grow muscles alongside you.
- If you fail, you'll be encouraged... or taunted. Probably taunted.
- If you succeed, your musculature will be like one you've never seen.

Download now and start your journey to become the one and only Dogginator.
